pages.text: Within the flesh-red gravel of the underworld, maligned treasures act as silent witnesses to the horrors of a land darkened by flame. $(br2)Findings described as: blistering, sinister, warped.

Dark secrets linger in the embers of this forsaken world - a red-hot crucible of life which is both cradle and grave to the forces of chaos and decay. Yet, even for its harsh ecosystem, gentle hideous creatures relish a land that tenderly swaddles their vile existence in kind, like a proper home. Was this world present at the beginning of the story, or a dire refuge crafted at the height of a blasphemous society?
